structure.unit: Sec. 11-2131. - SAME—DRIVING IN FUNERAL OR OTHER PROCESSIONS.

law.catch_line: SAME—DRIVING IN FUNERAL OR OTHER PROCESSIONS.

text.section: A funeral composed of a procession of vehicles shall be identified by burning lights on the cars in the procession while proceeding to the cemetery.
Each driver in a funeral or other procession shall drive as near to the right-hand edge of the roadway as practical and follow the vehicle ahead as closely as practical and safe. (Code 1959 , §21-30)
